org.threadly.load

Interface ScriptStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScriptStep

    public interface ScriptStep

    Interface for the minimum API for any test step to be executed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.CharSequence getIdentifier()
      Get the name or identifier that was provided at construction for this test step.
      ScriptStepType getStepType()
      Checked before step execution.
      void runStep()
      This must be implemented for the actual execution of the script step.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentifier

        java.lang.CharSequence getIdentifier()
        Get the name or identifier that was provided at construction for this test step.
        Returns:
        Script step name

      • getStepType

        ScriptStepType getStepType()
        Checked before step execution. This indicates what type of script step this is, and thus how results from the step should be handled.
        Returns:
        A non-null type to indicate how this step should be ran

      • runStep

        void runStep()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        This must be implemented for the actual execution of the script step. This invocation should block until the step has completed. If the script completed without error just return normally. If the test failed, it is expected this will throw an exception which represents the error.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if any failure occurred while running the test
